Source: https://latitude.to/articles-by-country/za/south-africa/407246/bloemhoek-dam. Coordinates extracted from the GPS location of Bloemhoek Dam, which is associated with the Bloemhoek Gold Project. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.sibanyestillwater.com/business/southern-africa/gold-operations/projects/. The Bloemhoek Gold Project is part of the Southern Free State (SOFS) project, located near Welkom

web_search_companies.notes: Sibanye-Stillwater acquired the assets including Bloemhoek through the acquisition of Wits Gold.
